about_the_game:
The Defense of Trewel Towers, or Trewel Towers, is a VR tower defense game. It contains a story mode as well as a 1-4 player endless mode. Still in development with student team.

Story: The player embodies the Orna Kingdoms hero and defends the kingdom using their archery skills from atop an array of towers. The player follows the hero's story, gaining magical abilities and upgrading the tower defenses in order to repel the invaders from another world.

Multiplayer: Grab your bow and party up with up to four of your friends, or unknown heroes, to help defend the keep from the Demon Lord's armies!

Key Features:
  • Single Player story mode
  • 1-4 Player Endless mode
  • 6+ magical abilities to unlock
  • Tower Defense + Archery
  • Customizable Avatars
